title: Spellbook of cure sickness
data:
**[English]()**

 • [한국어](/wiki/Spellbook_of_cure_sickness/ko "Spellbook of cure sickness/ko")

| [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") of +   cure sickness   [![Light green spellbook.png](/images/7/7d/Light_green_spellbook.png)](/wiki/File:Light_green_spellbook.png) |                                                               |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                                   | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
| Abundance                                                                                                                                                                    | [3.25%](/wiki/Spellbook#Generation "Spellbook")               |
|                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                               |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                                   | 300 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                             |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                                       | [50](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                   |
| Turns to read                                                                                                                                                                | 6                                                             |
| Ink to write                                                                                                                                                                 | [15–29](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                               |
| Spell type                                                                                                                                                                   | [healing](/wiki/Healing_spells "Healing spells")              |
| Level                                                                                                                                                                        | 3                                                             |
| Power cost                                                                                                                                                                   | 15 [Pw](/wiki/Power "Power")                                  |
| Direction                                                                                                                                                                    | non-directional                                               |
| Special for                                                                                                                                                                  | [healer](/wiki/Healer "Healer")                               |

In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, the **spellbook of cure sickness** can be [read](/wiki/Read "Read") to learn the **spell of cure sickness**. It is a level 3 [healing spell](/wiki/Healing_spell "Healing spell"), and the [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") takes roughly six turns to read. The spell qualifies as an [emergency spell](/wiki/Emergency_spell "Emergency spell"), and is the [special spell](/wiki/Special_spell "Special spell") for [Healers](/wiki/Healer "Healer").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
- [2 Description](#Description)
- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [4 Variants](#Variants)
  - [4.1 EvilHack](#EvilHack)

## Generation

The spellbook of cure sickness makes up 3.25% of randomly-generated spellbooks.

## Description

When cast, the spell cures all forms of [sickness](/wiki/Sickness "Sickness"), including [food poisoning](/wiki/Food_poisoning "Food poisoning") and [illness](/wiki/Illness "Illness"), and stops [sliming](/wiki/Sliming "Sliming").

## Strategy

While most characters will prefer a blessed [unicorn horn](/wiki/Unicorn_horn "Unicorn horn") in most situations, the spell of cure sickness is one of the few curative methods that can be made 100% reliable - even a blessed unicorn horn is not guaranteed to cure illness. In addition, the spell is one of the safest means of curing sliming. High-level [Healers](/wiki/Healers "Healers") with 18 [wisdom](/wiki/Wisdom "Wisdom") can cast this spell with 0% failure rates, even while wearing [metallic](/wiki/Metallic "Metallic") armor without a [robe](/wiki/Robe "Robe").

## Variants

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), the spell of cure sickness is directional and can be cast at other monsters - this will anger peaceful monsters unless they have an ailment that can be cured with the spell. The spell can also deal damage to [zombies](/wiki/Zombie_\(EvilHack\) "Zombie (EvilHack)") when cast at them.

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")
html:
Spellbook of cure sickness

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
English

 • 한국어

spellbook of
+   cure sickness  
Appearance random
Abundance 3.25%
Base price 300 zm
Weight 50
Turns to read 6
Ink to write 15–29
Spell type healing
Level 3
Power cost 15 Pw
Direction non-directional
Special for healer

In NetHack, the spellbook of cure sickness can be read to learn the spell of cure sickness. It is a level 3 healing spell, and the spellbook takes roughly six turns to read. The spell qualifies as an emergency spell, and is the special spell for Healers.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Strategy
  • 4 Variants
    • 4.1 EvilHack

Generation

The spellbook of cure sickness makes up 3.25% of randomly-generated spellbooks.

Description

When cast, the spell cures all forms of sickness, including food poisoning and illness, and stops sliming.

Strategy

While most characters will prefer a blessed unicorn horn in most situations, the spell of cure sickness is one of the few curative methods that can be made 100% reliable - even a blessed unicorn horn is not guaranteed to cure illness. In addition, the spell is one of the safest means of curing sliming. High-level Healers with 18 wisdom can cast this spell with 0% failure rates, even while wearing metallic armor without a robe.

Variants

EvilHack

In EvilHack, the spell of cure sickness is directional and can be cast at other monsters - this will anger peaceful monsters unless they have an ailment that can be cured with the spell. The spell can also deal damage to zombies when cast at them.

==Description==

==Strategy==
While most characters will prefer a blessed [[unicorn horn]] in most situations, the spell of cure sickness is one of the few curative methods that can be made 100% reliable - even a blessed unicorn horn is not guaranteed to cure illness. In addition, the spell is one of the safest means of curing sliming.
